bike.description: Specialized E5 AEROTEC, fully manipulated aero tubing, compact Transition design, internal brake and derailleur guides, replacable derailleur hanger

Specialized Mindset, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, sealed cartridge bearings, carbon 20mm cone with two 5mm alloy spacers
Specialized Pro, 3D forged alloy, 31.8mm bar clamp, 4- position adjustable
Specialized Zertz Transition bullhorn bars, 31.8 clamp, with Profile Designs Carbon Stryke aero bars
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon w/2.5mm gel padding
Tektro R725, aero brakes with cartridge pads
Tektro R725, aero brakes with cartridge pads
FSA integrated, exterior cartridge bearings, alloy
Alex ALX 330, alloy double wall aero rim, machined sidewalls
Alex ALX 330, 24 hole, aluminum freehub body, four cartridge bearings, QR
Body Geometry Transition Pro saddle, microfiber cover, full nose padding, cro-mo rails
Specialized Transition carbon, aero seatpost with Speed Zertz
Chain stay protector, reflectors, chain catcher, clear coat, owners manual
